document.full_text: asdrubal cabrera stayed red-hot with three hits, including the game-winning rbi in the eighth inning, to give the cleveland indians a 3-2 victory over the boston red sox on monday and their fourth successive win.
document.title: surging cabrera rallies indians over red sox
lines_and_colors: asdrubal cabrera stayed red-hot with three hits, including the game-winning rbi in the eighth inning, to give the cleveland indians a 3-2 victory over the boston red sox on monday and their fourth successive win.
